snippet: After early efforts to plug a leaky well failed, officials see a relief well as the solution. But drilling such a well takes time.
abstract: Southern California Gas Company says drilling of relief well to address natural-gas leak is on schedule to be finished by late February; experts say relief well is almost certain to deal with leak, although they note it is expensive last-ditch solution; several thousand families in Porter Ranch, have been temporarily relocated due to toxic effects of methane, main component of natural gas.
lead_paragraph: After early efforts to plug a leaky well failed, officials see a relief well as the solution. But drilling such a well takes time.

headline.main: No Short-Term Fix for California Methane Leak
headline.print_headline: Leaking Gas Well to Take at Least 30 to 45 Days to Fix
